title.rendered: MSD Pharmaceutical partners with Smile Foundation for Healthcare Services

content.rendered:
MSD Pharmaceuticals expands healthcare reach through Mobile Telemedicine Units

MSD Pharmaceuticals has partnered with Smile Foundation to significantly improve healthcare accessibility through a network of mobile telemedicine units. Initially, MSD supported four units in Uttar Pradesh, covering Varanasi, Balrampur and Chandauli, and one unit in Gaya, Bihar.

Building on this impact, MSD is now funding five additional units in Jharkhand, specifically in Chatara, Garhwa, Sahibganj, Dumka and West Singhbhoom. In the latest phase, the partnership has grown to include six more Smile on Wheels units across Uttar Pradesh, Assam and Karnataka, with two units each in these states. This expanded effort aims to enhance medical service delivery and address healthcare needs in these underserved areas.
